verses.verse: <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> to <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H5972>peoples,<s%> <S%H524>nations,<s%> and <S%H3961>languages,<s%> who <S%H1753>dwell<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth:<s%> <S%H8001>Peace<s%> be multiplied to <S%H7680>you.<s%>

It has <S%H6925>seemed<s%> <S%H8232>good<s%> to me to <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H852>signs<s%> and <S%H8540>wonders<s%> that the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> has <S%H5648>worked<s%> toward <S%H5974>me.<s%>

<S%H4101>How<s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> are his <S%H852>signs!<s%> and <S%H4101>how<s%> <S%H8624>mighty<s%> are his <S%H8540>wonders!<s%> his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> and his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is <S%H5974>from<s%> <S%H1859>generation<s%> to <S%H1859>generation.<s%>
<S%H576>I,<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> <S%H1934>was<s%> at <S%H7954>rest<s%> in my <S%H1005>house,<s%> and <S%H7487>flourishing<s%> in my <S%H1965>palace.<s%>

I <S%H2370>saw<s%> a <S%H2493>dream<s%> which made me <S%H1763>afraid;<s%> and the <S%H2031>thoughts<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> my <S%H4903>bed<s%> and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> troubled <S%H927>me.<s%>

<S%H4481>Therefore<s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> <S%H4481>I<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H5954>bring<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> <S%H3046>me,<s%> that they might make known to me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H2493>dream.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H5954>came<s%> in the <S%H2749>magicians,<s%> the <S%H826>enchanters,<s%> the <S%H3779>Chaldeans,<s%> and the <S%H1505>soothsayers;<s%> and <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H560>told<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> <S%H3809>them;<s%> but they did not make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me its <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

But <S%H5705>at<s%> the <S%H318>last<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> came <S%H5922>in<s%> before <S%H6925>me,<s%> whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> according to the <S%H8036>name<s%> of my <S%H426>god,<s%> and in whom is the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods:<s%> and I <S%H560>told<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> before <S%H6925>him,<s%> saying,

<S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> <S%H7229>master<s%> of the <S%H2749>magicians,<s%> because <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H3046>know<s%> that the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods<s%> is in <S%H3606>you,<s%> and no <S%H7328>secret<s%> <S%H598>troubles<s%> <S%H560>you,<s%> tell me the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H2493>dream<s%> that I have <S%H2370>seen,<s%> and its <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

Thus were the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> my <S%H4903>bed:<s%> I <S%H1934>saw,<s%> and <S%H431>behold,<s%> a <S%H363>tree<s%> in the <S%H1459>midst<s%> of the <S%H772>earth;<s%> and its <S%H7314>height<s%> was <S%H7690>great.<s%>

The <S%H363>tree<s%> <S%H7236>grew,<s%> and was <S%H8631>strong,<s%> and its <S%H7314>height<s%> <S%H4291>reached<s%> to the <S%H8065>sky,<s%> and its <S%H2379>sight<s%> to the <S%H5491>end<s%> of <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth.<s%>

The <S%H6074>leaves<s%> of it were <S%H8209>beautiful,<s%> and its <S%H4>fruit<s%> <S%H7690>much,<s%> and in it was <S%H4203>food<s%> for <S%H3606>all:<s%> the <S%H2423>animals<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> had <S%H2927>shadow<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> <S%H6853>it,<s%> and the birds of the <S%H8065>sky<s%> <S%H1753>lived<s%> in its <S%H6056>branches,<s%> and <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H1321>flesh<s%> was <S%H2110>fed<s%> from <S%H4481>it.<s%>

I <S%H1934>saw<s%> in the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> my <S%H4903>bed,<s%> and <S%H431>behold,<s%> a <S%H5894>watcher<s%> and a holy <S%H6922>one<s%> came <S%H5182>down<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H8065>sky.<s%>

He <S%H7123>cried<s%> <S%H2429>aloud,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus,<s%> Cut <S%H1414>down<s%> the <S%H363>tree,<s%> and cut <S%H7113>off<s%> its <S%H6056>branches,<s%> shake <S%H5426>off<s%> its <S%H6074>leaves,<s%> and <S%H921>scatter<s%> its <S%H4>fruit:<s%> let the <S%H2423>animals<s%> get <S%H5111>away<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> under <S%H8479>it,<s%> and the <S%H6853>fowls<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> its <S%H6056>branches.<s%>

<S%H1297>Nevertheless<s%> <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> of its <S%H8330>roots<s%> in the <S%H772>earth,<s%> even with a <S%H613>band<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H5174>brass,<s%> in the tender <S%H1883>grass<s%> of the <S%H1251>field;<s%> and let it be <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of the <S%H8065>sky:<s%> and let his <S%H2508>portion<s%> be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>animals<s%> in the <S%H6211>grass<s%> of the <S%H772>earth:<s%>

let his <S%H3825>heart<s%> be <S%H8133>changed<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>man<s%>'s, and let an <S%H2423>animal<s%>'s <S%H3825>heart<s%> be <S%H3052>given<s%> to <S%H7655>him;<s%> and let seven <S%H5732>times<s%> <S%H2499>pass<s%> over <S%H5922>him.<s%>

The <S%H6600>sentence<s%> is by the <S%H1510>decree<s%> of the <S%H5894>watchers,<s%> and the <S%H7595>demand<s%> by the <S%H3983>word<s%> of the holy <S%H6922>ones;<s%> <S%H5705>to<s%> the <S%H1701>intent<s%> that the <S%H2417>living<s%> may <S%H3046>know<s%> that the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>rules<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men,<s%> and <S%H5415>gives<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomever<s%> he <S%H6634>will,<s%> and sets <S%H6966>up<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> it the <S%H8215>lowest<s%> of <S%H606>men.<s%>

<S%H1836>This<s%> <S%H2493>dream<s%> <S%H576>I,<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> have <S%H2370>seen;<s%> and <S%H607>you,<s%> <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> <S%H560>declare<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation,<s%> <S%H6903>because<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of my <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> are <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H3202>able<s%> to make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H6591>interpretation;<s%> but <S%H607>you<s%> are <S%H3546>able;<s%> for the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> gods is in <S%H426>you.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> was stricken <S%H8075>mute<s%> for <S%H2298>a<s%> <S%H8160>while,<s%> and his <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> <S%H4430>him.<s%> The king <S%H6032>answered,<s%> <S%H560><s%> <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> <S%H409>don't<s%> let the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> or the <S%H6591>interpretation,<s%> <S%H927>trouble<s%> <S%H1096>you.<s%> Belteshazzar <S%H6032>answered,<s%> My <S%H4756>lord,<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> be to those who <S%H8131>hate<s%> <S%H6591>you,<s%> and its interpretation to your <S%H6146>adversaries.<s%>

The <S%H363>tree<s%> that you <S%H2370>saw,<s%> which <S%H7236>grew,<s%> and was <S%H8631>strong,<s%> whose <S%H7314>height<s%> <S%H4291>reached<s%> to the <S%H8065>sky,<s%> and its <S%H2379>sight<s%> to <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth;<s%>

whose <S%H6074>leaves<s%> were <S%H8209>beautiful,<s%> and its <S%H4>fruit<s%> <S%H7690>much,<s%> and in it was <S%H4203>food<s%> for <S%H3606>all;<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> which the <S%H2423>animals<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> <S%H1753>lived,<s%> and on whose <S%H6056>branches<s%> the <S%H6853>birds<s%> of the <S%H8065>sky<s%> had their <S%H7932>habitation:<s%>

it is <S%H607>you,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> that are <S%H7236>grown<s%> and become <S%H8631>strong;<s%> for your <S%H7238>greatness<s%> is <S%H7236>grown,<s%> and <S%H4291>reaches<s%> to the <S%H8065>sky,<s%> and your <S%H7985>dominion<s%> to the <S%H5491>end<s%> of the <S%H772>earth.<s%>

Whereas the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H2370>saw<s%> a <S%H5894>watcher<s%> and a holy <S%H6922>one<s%> coming <S%H5182>down<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H8065>sky,<s%> and <S%H560>saying,<s%> <S%H1414>Cut<s%> <S%H1414>down<s%> the <S%H363>tree,<s%> and <S%H2255>destroy<s%> <S%H1297>it;<s%> nevertheless <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> of its <S%H8330>roots<s%> in the <S%H772>earth,<s%> even with a <S%H613>band<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H5174>brass,<s%> in the tender <S%H1883>grass<s%> of the <S%H1251>field,<s%> and let it be <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of the <S%H8065>sky:<s%> and let his <S%H2508>portion<s%> be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>animals<s%> of the <S%H1251>field,<s%> <S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> <S%H2499>pass<s%> over <S%H5922>him;<s%>

<S%H1836>this<s%> is the <S%H6591>interpretation,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> and <S%H1932>it<s%> is the <S%H1510>decree<s%> of the Most <S%H5943>High,<s%> which has <S%H4291>come<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> my <S%H4756>lord<s%> the <S%H4430>king:<s%>

that you shall be <S%H2957>driven<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men,<s%> and your <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>animals<s%> of the <S%H1251>field,<s%> and you shall be made to <S%H2939>eat<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen,<s%> and shall be <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of the <S%H8065>sky,<s%> and <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> shall <S%H2499>pass<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> <S%H5705>you;<s%> until you <S%H3046>know<s%> that the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>rules<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men,<s%> and <S%H5415>gives<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomever<s%> he <S%H6634>will.<s%>

Whereas they <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> of the <S%H8330>roots<s%> of the <S%H363>tree;<s%> your <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H7011>sure<s%> to <S%H4481>you,<s%> after that you shall have <S%H3046>known<s%> that the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> do <S%H7990>rule.<s%>

<S%H3861>Therefore,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> let my <S%H4431>counsel<s%> be <S%H8232>acceptable<s%> to <S%H5922>you,<s%> and break <S%H6562>off<s%> your <S%H2408>sins<s%> by <S%H6665>righteousness,<s%> and your <S%H5758>iniquities<s%> by showing <S%H2604>mercy<s%> to the <S%H6033>poor;<s%> <S%H2006>if<s%> there may <S%H1934>be<s%> a <S%H754>lengthening<s%> of your <S%H7963>tranquility.<s%>
<S%H3606>All<s%> this <S%H4291>came<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar.<s%>
At the <S%H7118>end<s%> of <S%H8648>twelve<s%> <S%H3393>months<s%> he was <S%H1934>walking<s%> <S%H5922>in<s%> the <S%H4437>royal<s%> <S%H1965>palace<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spoke<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> <S%H576>Is<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H1932>this<s%> <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> which <S%H576>I<s%> have <S%H1124>built<s%> for the <S%H4437>royal<s%> dwelling <S%H8632>place,<s%> by the might of my <S%H2632>power<s%> and for the <S%H3367>glory<s%> of my <S%H1923>majesty?<s%>

<S%H5751>While<s%> the <S%H4406>word<s%> was in the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H6433>mouth,<s%> there <S%H5308>fell<s%> a <S%H7032>voice<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H8065>sky,<s%> <S%H4430>saying,<s%> O king <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> to you it is <S%H560>spoken:<s%> The <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> has <S%H5709>departed<s%> from <S%H4481>you:<s%>

and you shall be <S%H2957>driven<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men;<s%> and your <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> shall be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>animals<s%> of the <S%H1251>field;<s%> you shall be made to <S%H2939>eat<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen;<s%> and <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> shall <S%H2499>pass<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> <S%H5705>you;<s%> until you <S%H3046>know<s%> that the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>rules<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men,<s%> and <S%H5415>gives<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomever<s%> he <S%H6634>will.<s%>

The same <S%H8160>hour<s%> was the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H5487>fulfilled<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar:<s%> and he was <S%H2957>driven<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men,<s%> and <S%H399>ate<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen,<s%> and his <S%H1655>body<s%> was <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of the <S%H8065>sky,<s%> <S%H5705>until<s%> his <S%H8177>hair<s%> was <S%H7236>grown<s%> like <S%H5403>eagles<s%>' <S%H2953>feathers,<s%> and his nails like <S%H6853>birds<s%>' claws.

At the <S%H7118>end<s%> of the <S%H3118>days<s%> <S%H576>I,<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> lifted <S%H5191>up<s%> my <S%H5870>eyes<s%> to <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and my <S%H4486>understanding<s%> <S%H8421>returned<s%> to <S%H5922>me,<s%> and I <S%H1289>blessed<s%> the Most <S%H5943>High,<s%> and I <S%H7624>praised<s%> and <S%H1922>honored<s%> him who <S%H2417>lives<s%> <S%H5957>forever;<s%> for his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H7985>dominion,<s%> and his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H5974>from<s%> <S%H1859>generation<s%> to <S%H1859>generation.<s%>

<S%H3606>All<s%> the <S%H1753>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H772>earth<s%> are <S%H2804>reputed<s%> as <S%H3809>nothing;<s%> and he <S%H5648>does<s%> according to his <S%H6634>will<s%> in the <S%H2429>army<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven,<s%> and among the <S%H1753>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H772>earth;<s%> and <S%H3809>none<s%> <S%H383>can<s%> <S%H4223>stay<s%> his <S%H3028>hand,<s%> or <S%H560>ask<s%> <S%H4101>him,<s%> What are you <S%H5648>doing?<s%>

At the same <S%H2166>time<s%> my <S%H4486>understanding<s%> <S%H8421>returned<s%> to <S%H5922>me;<s%> and for the <S%H3367>glory<s%> of my <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> my <S%H1923>majesty<s%> and <S%H2122>brightness<s%> <S%H8421>returned<s%> to <S%H5922>me;<s%> and my <S%H1907>counselors<s%> and my <S%H7261>lords<s%> <S%H1156>sought<s%> to <S%H5922>me;<s%> and I was <S%H8627>established<s%> in my <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H3493>excellent<s%> <S%H7238>greatness<s%> was added to <S%H3255>me.<s%>

<S%H3705>Now<s%> <S%H576>I,<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> <S%H7624>praise<s%> and <S%H7313>extol<s%> and <S%H1922>honor<s%> the <S%H4430>King<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven;<s%> for <S%H3606>all<s%> his <S%H4567>works<s%> are <S%H7187>truth,<s%> and his <S%H735>ways<s%> <S%H1780>justice;<s%> and those who <S%H1981>walk<s%> in <S%H1467>pride<s%> he is <S%H3202>able<s%> to <S%H8214>abase.<s%>
